title: ChampSelect ->BugSplat ->Client Repair ->AFK ->5 game Low Priority = Help
body:
Right after champselect it'd go into a black screen, then BugSplat would appear and i would send the report. right after it'd say that my client has and issue and it'll try and repair. By the time i reconnect the game ends, and now i have 5 game low priority.

This is the Second time this happened, if there's anyone with the same issue and have some type of solution please Share.

If there's anyway for one of the staff to remove this low priority from my account it would be amazing (if possible).

This not AFK. This is a BugSplat Error to Client Repair.

Thanks alot.
Bang

P.S. Proof would be the report the bugsplat had me sent.

replies.body: Essentially you received that LPQ due to the fact that your teammates were left to try and 4v5 without a fifth member there to help them. We definitely need to try and address those crashes before you hop back in the queue, since it sounds like some of the game files might be corrupted. Run through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and make sure to test it in a custom game first.
